description.originalText: We agreed on pricing but she would change it every visit. She is very lazy & did bare minimum work. She slept through the entire night without once checking on my 1 year old via my cameras.  Very lazy & very greedy for money!

We had scheduled to do an in person meeting with Zaman however she cancelled on us twice in a row. The first time she informed us a couple hours before the meeting time that her friend was going to active labor (which was understandable). We rescheduled to meet two days after the original date; the day of I had to follow up twice and she finally told me a couple hours before the meeting time that she has a fever and she thought she had responded to my text. I am aware that Zaman may be telling the truth and it was just bad timing for us; I am disappointed as she could have just told us if she is not able to make it. Twice in a row in the same week feels a bit too much of a coincidence. We were excited to meet her given her exceptional reviews on care.com but were disappointed that we did not have the same experience.

description.displayText:
Ms. Zaman has been sitting my sons, aged 2 and 4 respectively, for the past year at several locations. Always punctual, occasionally arrival to the house before I do. She exhibits care and professionalism continuously. My boys love her and gravitate to her upon arrival. During her care, she provides meals, assists with homework, and facilities playtime, including learning games. I absolutely recommend her for your care-taking needs.

All the best,

description.displayText: Zaman is truly wonderful. She has been helping me out with my newborn ever since he was 3 weeks old and I had to go back to work - I am a freelancer and so my schedule is all over the place. For starters, Zaman is patient and flexible -  I was a bit nervous to leave my baby but as soon as I watched Zaman care for him, I felt immediately relaxed. She not only cares for him in a tender loving way, she interacts with him educationally - counts in different languages, reads books, does Tummy time, uses the Lovevery toys, etc. She also helps clean up and records everything she does with him so I know what happened while I was gone. My son always looks happy with Zaman which makes me happy!
description.originalText: Zaman is truly wonderful. description.displayText: I have hired Zaman several times to babysit my 4 year old son.  She was the first "stranger" I ever hired to watch my son but I was soon put at ease by her willingness to text with me beforehand and her offer to talk on the phone or have a video call if I wanted to.  Every time Zaman comes over she is right on time - and that is saying something considering how long it can take to find parking in my area.  She and my son chill and have fun - you can tell she is a real professional because if she sees that my son doesn't want us to leave she will distract him with a toy or game so we can slip out without any tears.  I 100% would recommend hiring Zaman as your next babysitter!

description.displayText: Zaman is wonderful. She is great with the kids, and you can tell immediately she is very experienced. She has helped so many times in last minute situations and is always willing to try to accommodate. I wouldn't hesitate to hire her. I highly recommend her.
description.originalText: Zaman is wonderful. She is great with the kids, and you can tell immediately she is very experienced. She has helped so many times in last minute situations and is always willing to try to accommodate. I wouldn't hesitate to hire her. I highly recommend her.

description.displayText: We hired Zaman as a date night sitter for our kids (3 and 5) and are so happy we found her! She is so engaging with the kids. As soon as she arrives she gets right on the floor with them coming up with a fun game to play. Our kids are always so excited when they hear she is coming to babysit and quite frankly can't wait for us to leave so they can play with her! She is also incredibly trustworthy, great with communication and always on time. We are so thankful for her!

description.displayText: We love Zaman! She is very polite and modest, but she has a very positive for babysitting. She takes care of not only our 8 months baby but also 2 dogs very well. Though it's from early in the morning to midnight for 3 days, she came our place punctually and really did well. We highly recommend her and would like to ask her again.

Though it's from early in the morning to midnight for 3 days, she came our place punctually and really did well. We highly recommend her and would like to ask her again.

description.displayText: Zaman was fantastic, she cared for our 11 month year old son. Hiring her was our first experience with child care so we were anxious and neurotic. Zaman immediately put us at ease and established a rapport, engaging and nurturing our son. Her references were impeccable, she was considerate, comfortable around our big dog and just a pleasure to work with.

description.displayText: In our experience with Zaman, she is nice and attentive. She's very hands on and caring towards our son!
